thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Conmed Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.65

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Conmed Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.65
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Conmed Corp:
* ORATION ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.11 TO $2.17 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.65 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.63 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.69 * Q4 SALES $222.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $211.3 MILLION
* EXPECTS FULL-YEAR 2018 CONSTANT CURRENCY SALES GROWTH IN 4.0% TO 5.0% RANGE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
